tweet: Taking a moment to pause and reflect on #VietnamWarVeteransDay. Thank you to the women and men who served in Vietnam.

Congress must take concrete steps to address threats of climate change. This week I joined a bill to prohibit using fed $ to withdraw from Paris Agreement & call on the admin to develop a public plan for US to meet agreement’s greenhouse gas reduction goals #HR9 #ClimateActionNow

Veterans injured in the line of duty should be able to start families. My bill with @PattyMurray would permanently overturn the IVF prohibition at the Department of Veterans Affairs @CBSNews @cbs46 https://www.cbsnews.com/video/female-veteran-denied-ivf-benefits-because-shes-single/ …

This week, the House voted to overturn POTUS veto, end pay disparities based on gender & condemn admin’s ban on transgender servicemembers. @TransportDems Committee also passed my bill to protect FAA in future govt shutdowns #RecapWithRick #ForThePeople https://youtu.be/lhvqWiuw9Lg
I oppose the administration’s ban and will continue to fight to overturn this disastrous policy so anyone who is willing and qualified can serve in the armed forces. #TransMilitaryBan
The administration’s ban on transgender troops serving in the military is arbitrary, discriminatory and disrespectful to thousands of transgender servicemembers, past and present.

This week, @RepPeteDeFazio & I sent a letter to FAA urging the agency to engage an independent, third-party review composed of individuals w/the technical skills & expertise to objectively assess corrective measures proposed for the 737 MAX. pic.twitter.com/MYLdt8wc5k
Staffers are pretty smart https://twitter.com/RepKatieHill/status/1111028308576219136 …
Focus!

All employees deserve equal pay for equal work. Ending pay disparities based on gender and closing the earnings gap will create more equal opportunity and ensure Washington state’s economic success. #PaycheckFairnessAct #EqualPayForEqualWork pic.twitter.com/w8xaJjxBrK

The government shutdown hurt American families, the U.S. aviation & aerospace economy & jeopardized the safety of the National Airspace System. Congress must do what it can to ensure FAA, its employees and the U.S. aviation economy are protected from another government shutdown. https://twitter.com/TransportDems/status/1110911175242534912 …

I also oppose the Department of Defense’s misguided effort to circumvent Congress and repurpose $1 billion from personnel costs for wall construction. The administration appears to view military funding as a piggy bank it can raid at will.

The president continues to push for wasteful funding for an ineffective wall. Congress has already passed, and the president has signed, a bipartisan, bicameral agreement to provide funding for smart, effective border security, including $1.375 billion for new fencing.

I voted to terminate President Trump’s emergency declaration at the Southern border and overturn President Trump’s veto because Congress has a Constitutional obligation to serve as a check on the president.

WA airports need an estimated $12.6B in aviation infrastructure investment to continue to meet passenger growth & remain globally connected. Lifting PFC cap will improve airports’ ability to maintain and modernize safe infrastructure & plan for future. #RaiseTheCap #PFC

Rep @JudgeCarter & I introduced a bill to protect benefits of children of fallen servicemembers. The Children of Fallen Servicemembers AMT Relief Act changes tax law so a Survivor Benefit Plan annuity paid to a minor is no longer subject to Alt Minimum Tax https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EagIkYDQsLA& …
While this collective support has helped Oso heal since 2014, the tragedy and those who lost their lives will never be forgotten. pic.twitter.com/oseybRuYpS

5 years ago, the mudslide in Oso killed 43 people and forever changed Northern Snohomish County. The community has shown its strength, resilience and compassion - pulling together through the kindness of neighbors, and the bravery of first responders and volunteers.

The Women Veterans and Families Health Services Act supports #veterans injured in the line of duty who want to start families. The bill would permanently overturn the #IVF prohibition at the Department of Veterans Affairs. @PattyMurray https://www.seattletimes.com/opinion/editorials/veterans-deserve-reproductive-health-services/ …

The Youth Access to American Jobs Act will help high school students access in-demand jobs related to #STEM industries by creating a pathway through community college and into an in-demand registered apprenticeship. pic.twitter.com/1FPJHpiyLU

Voter ID laws are discriminatory. Studies show #VoterID laws put in place higher hurdles for Americans to vote. The America Votes Act will help remove these hurdles. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IXYUFPwo0jk …
